Subject: RE: Press release for tomorrow

(USANYS) 6" 
(USANYS) 
Thanks. Sorry to bother, but do you have any indication as to when? (Our SEC counterparts have been continuously 
asking.) 
And for what it's worth (I realize this is out of our control) anything after Ghislaine Maxwell's arraignment at 2:30 won't 
get much attention. 
From: (USANYS) 1 
Sent: Friday, April 23, 2021 12:25 PM 
To USANYS)

Subject: Re: Press release for tomorrow 
I will. I understand there is a delay in the presentment. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Apr 23, 2021, at 10:58 AM (USANYS) wrote: 
Great. you'll let us know when this is ready to be issued? Thanks.

From: USANYS) [Contractor] 
Sent: Friday, April 23, 2021 9:02 AM 
To (USANYS) 1 
Cc (USANYS) 
(USANYS) 6 
Subject: Re: Press release for tomorrow 
SEC says they think they'll be ready shortly after 11. 
Chief Public Information Officer 
U.S. Attorney's Office, SONY 
(office) 
(cell) 
On Apr 22, 2021, at 6:25 PM 
USANYS) 
(USANYS) 1 wrote: 
USPIS made an unexpectedly early arrest this afternoon in a securities case. The defendant will be presented 
tomorrow morning in Florida and we'd like to release simultaneously with the SEC, which is filing a parallel complaint, 
shortly after the presentment if possible. Attached is a PR, approved be I took a stab at the-quote, but 
happy to have you work your magic. Sorry for the tight turn on this one. Please let me know of any 
comments/questions. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
P: 
F: 
<Franzone Arrest PR amg approved.docx> 
<21 MAG 4261 SEALE. 2021.04.19 Complaint Final.pdf> 
EFTA00011049
